app usage strings Open Apps with usage access settings "Last time used: " "Time span: " Failed to retrieve app usage statistics. You may need to enable access for this app through Settings > Security > Apps with usage access
focus mode strings Help you get attention to your work. Setting Start Next Until: Cancel Last: >>Permitted Application Setting<< Permitted Application: ERROR: Can\'t find this application. ERROR: Please set last for at least one minute. Confirm & Continue Hour Minute Hour(s) Minute(s) (null) APP is opening, please wait Please give the permission of floating window. If study mode run without expectation, please give the permission of floating window. Your phone didn\'t have the UsageStats Function, you can\'t use this APP, but I\'ll add support later. Please give the permission of UsageStats. Provide a way to force exit. If you want exit when the study mode is opened, just touch the time on the screen. While you touching, long click the invisible button where is at the lower-left of the screen, then it will quit. In order to get the wallpaper, please give the \"External Storage Reading\" permission. OK Please let this program using the storage permission. Your version is the latest. Server ERROR Network ERROR Network Changed Can\'t download, Lack Of Space Can\'t download, Permission Denied. Unknown ERROR
